title: Kidnapped newborn sentencing hearing begins
text:
Kidnapped newborn sentencing hearing begins 1:49am IST - 02:11
The sentencing hearing began in Jacksonville, Florida on Thursday for Gloria Williams, who plead guilty earlier this year of kidnapping a newborn child in 1998. Shanara Mobley, the biological mother of Kamiyah Mobley, and Williams' ex-boyfriend, Charles Manigo, who helped raise Mobley, both testified on Thursday saying that Williams should get the maximum sentence of 22 years in prison.
